timeline.message: CB-9503 - Env creation fails with private endpoint when created with restricted resource group permissions

timeline.bodyText: Just for clarification: why is poll for creation started when an exception is thrown? I have not found a catch clause in calling methods, I guess the creation will fail.
timeline.author: gergopapi2

replies.bodyText: The poll here is started to handle the status change and refresh the status of the resource to the up-to-date status seen in the cloud provider in case of an exception
replies.author: pdarvasi

timeline.bodyText: Another question: in case there was no permission to create a DNS zone, how come this error message was shown to the user? How did the deployment get deleted?
timeline.author: gergopapi2

replies.bodyText: Because this exception got propagated to the UI instead of the Azure exception, before the fix
replies.author: pdarvasi
